objects.specification: A durable light grey flooring panel covering the entire classroom floor, with a smooth matte finish that provides a neutral and practical surface for foot traffic. It features subtle texturing to prevent slipping and is designed to integrate seamlessly with the surrounding furniture and walls. The material has a slightly reflective quality that brightens the room and complements the off-white walls.

A plain white suspended ceiling panel system forming a flat overhead surface, with a smooth finish and minimal seams. It provides a neutral backdrop for the ceiling-mounted lights and projector, helping to diffuse ambient illumination evenly across the room. The ceiling is finished in bright white paint to enhance the sense of spaciousness and light.

A smooth off-white painted wall panel, forming a vertical classroom boundary. The surface has a clean, matte finish to minimize glare while reflecting light evenly. This neutral tone enhances brightness and complements colorful decor elements.

A smooth off-white painted wall panel, forming a vertical classroom boundary. The surface has a clean, matte finish to minimize glare while reflecting light evenly. This neutral tone enhances brightness and complements colorful decor elements.

A smooth off-white painted wall panel, forming a vertical classroom boundary. The surface has a clean, matte finish to minimize glare while reflecting light evenly. This neutral tone enhances brightness and complements colorful decor elements.

A smooth off-white painted wall panel, forming a vertical classroom boundary. The surface has a clean, matte finish to minimize glare while reflecting light evenly. This neutral tone enhances brightness and complements colorful decor elements.

A medium-sized teacher's desk crafted from dark wood with a rich brown finish, featuring a rectangular tabletop and sturdy metal legs. The desk has a smooth matte surface with rounded edges for safety and a modesty panel at the front. It provides ample workspace for teaching materials and integrates a subtle blend of professional and traditional style.

An ergonomic teacher's chair upholstered in a soft pastel fabric, with a high backrest and cushioned seat. It features a subtle metal frame with a swiveling base and caster wheels. The design balances comfort and support, while the pastel hue complements the classroom color palette.

A large rectangular whiteboard with a smooth glossy white surface, framed by a slim metallic silver border. It is designed for wall mounting and includes a concealed rail for marker pens. The surface is magnetically receptive and provides a clear writing area for instructional purposes.

A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a sleek white housing and a prominent lens at the front. It includes ventilation grilles on the sides and mounting brackets for secure attachment. The design is modern and unobtrusive, blending seamlessly with the ceiling panel while delivering crisp projection.

A tall wooden bookshelf made from light wood with a natural grain finish, featuring five evenly spaced shelves. The shelves are filled with a diverse array of colorful books and educational materials. The design is simple and sturdy, balancing functionality with an inviting appearance.

An analog round wall clock with a white face, black numeric hour markers, and slim black hands. The clock has a thin black frame and a clear protective glass cover. Its classic design enhances visibility and adds a functional decorative element to the wall.

A tall green potted plant with broad lush leaves, housed in a simple cylindrical pot with a neutral finish. The foliage is full and vibrant, adding a natural accent. The pot features a subtle surface texture to complement the classroom decor.

A tall green potted plant with broad lush leaves, housed in a simple cylindrical pot with a neutral finish. The foliage is full and vibrant, adding a natural accent. The pot features a subtle surface texture to complement the classroom decor.

A rectangular LED panel light with a slim white frame and diffused cover, designed for flush mounting on the ceiling. It provides bright, even illuminance across the room and operates with cool white light. The design is minimalist and energy-efficient.

A rectangular LED panel light with a slim white frame and diffused cover, designed for flush mounting on the ceiling. It provides bright, even illuminance across the room and operates with cool white light. The design is minimalist and energy-efficient.

A colorful educational poster printed on matte paper, featuring engaging illustrations and charts. It has a slim protective lamination and a minimalistic frame. The vibrant graphics are designed to capture students' attention and reinforce learning concepts.

A large rectangular window with a clear glass pane set in a thin white frame, flanked by decorative curtains. The curtains are made of light fabric in a neutral tone, hanging in gentle folds. The window allows natural light to enter while adding visual interest to the back wall.

A simple cylindrical waste bin made from durable plastic with a neutral grey finish. It features an open top and a smooth external surface for easy cleaning. The design is unadorned and functional, fitting discreetly in corners of the room.

A simple cylindrical waste bin made from durable plastic with a neutral grey finish. It features an open top and a smooth external surface for easy cleaning. The design is unadorned and functional, fitting discreetly in corners of the room.

A medium-sized student desk with a light wood tone rectangular tabletop and slender metal legs. The desk has a smooth matte surface with rounded front edges and an integrated modesty panel. It provides individual workspace for students while maintaining a cohesive aesthetic with the teacher's desk.
